title: THANK YOU RIOT!
body: Just Wanted to say thank you riot for rewarding those who have been good with a free skin. I think it is cool that you guys are rewarding those who have "good behavior" and it is nice to see that riot appreciates it. Hope to see more of this and am glad to be part of the LoL community :)
